remarks: Change variable numbers in a 3-variable Diophantine class abstraction. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Oct-2014.)
statement:
rabren3dioph.a $e |- ( ( ( a ` 1 ) = ( b ` X ) /\ ( a ` 2 ) = ( b ` Y ) /\ ( a ` 3 ) = ( b ` Z ) ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rabren3dioph.b $e |- X e. ( 1 ... N ) $.
rabren3dioph.c $e |- Y e. ( 1 ... N ) $.
rabren3dioph.d $e |- Z e. ( 1 ... N ) $.
rabren3dioph $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ { a e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... 3 ) ) | ph } e. ( Dioph ` 3 ) ) -> { b e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... N ) ) | ps } e. ( Dioph ` N ) ) $.
$d N a b $.
$d X a b $.
$d Y a b $.
$d Z a b $.
$d a ps $.
$d b ph $.
